## Channel.fromPromise() method

Creates new channel with single value from given promise, then closes automatically iff promise has been resolved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromPromise<T>(p: Promise<T>): Channel<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | <code>Promise&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Channel<T>`
